mapper.select: select seq, division, title, writer, writeDate, viewCount,rown from (select codeQuestion.*, row_number() over (order by seq desc) as rown from codeQuestion where id=#{id}) where rown between #{start} and #{end}

select seq, division, c.title, c.writer, c.writeDate, viewCount from (select queseq from (select codeReply.*, row_number() over (order by seq desc) as rown from codeReply) where id=#{id} and rown between #{start} and #{end}) rep inner join codeQuestion c on rep.queseq = c.seq
